Dear all.
The current Heritrix.java does not adequately test its arguments=
.
If #arg=3D1, it assumes that the argument is the crawlorder-file, when it=

could be something else
In my patch I test for this case.
In the second pa=
tch (Heritrix-java-patch-2), I also have removed the
default initialization=
 of  crawlOrderFile. It seems to be superflous now.

(See attached file: He=
ritrix.java-patch2)(See attached file:
Heritrix.java-patch)

--------------=
----------------------------------------------
S=F8ren Vejrup Carlsen, DDA,=
